amendatorysection.catchline: Forest reserve funds; apportionment; certification to districts.
amendatorysection.para: The county treasurer shall, immediately after making the apportionment under section 79-1044, (1) enter the apportionment in a book kept for that purpose, (2) furnish the secretary of each district in the county a certificate showing the amount due such district, and (3) distribute the funds to each district in the amount due such district for its share of the Forest Reserve Fund.
